member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources.Source_Decompress
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. If source files should be decompressed with GZip.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources.Source_Files
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One or more file search patterns to read CSV from.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources.Source_NestingSeparator
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. Special character in the column name to indicate that nested document is needed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources.Source_NoUnquotedNulls
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. If unquoted NULL string should be treated as string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources.Source_TrimQuoted
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. If empty space at the start and end of the quoted value should be removed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.ConfigurationResources.Source_UseRegionalSettings
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Optional. If system regional settings should be used to parse the files. This includes such settings as list separator, number, date and time format.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Resources.DataItemIdFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} ({1}).

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Resources.InvalidNumberOfColumnsFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid number of columns: {0}, expected {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Resources.SourceDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Reads data from CSV files, either one or multiple.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Resources.UnexpectedCharacterFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unexpected character at row {0}, position {1}: "{2}".

member.summary: Provides data source adapters capable of reading data from one or more CSV files.

member.summary: Gets the description of the data adapter.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of with the provided configuration.
member.returns: Task that represents asynchronous create operation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Source.ICsvFileSourceAdapterConfiguration
member.summary: Contains configuration for CSV files data source.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Source.ICsvFileSourceAdapterConfiguration.Files
member.summary: Gets the list of file names to read CSV data from.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Source.ICsvFileSourceAdapterConfiguration.NestingSeparator
member.summary: Gets the separator sequence to identify nested documents from column names.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Source.ICsvFileSourceAdapterConfiguration.TrimQuoted
member.summary: Gets the value that indicates whether empty space in the quoted values should be trimmed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Source.ICsvFileSourceAdapterConfiguration.NoUnquotedNulls
member.summary: Gets the value that indicates whether unquoted NULL string should be treated as string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Source.ICsvFileSourceAdapterConfiguration.UseRegionalSettings
member.summary: Gets the value that indicates whether regional format settings should be used to parse the input files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.CsvFile.Source.ICsvFileSourceAdapterConfiguration.Decompress
member.summary: Gets the value that indicates whether input files should be decompressed.
